mapper.insert: insert into league ( LEAGUE_ID, LEAGUE_NAME, RGST_DATE, START_DATE, END_DATE, PRIZE_MONEY, PARTICIPATION_TEAM, PRIZE_GOOD, WINNING_TEAM, LEAGUE_STATUS_CD, TOURNAMENT_ID, ENTRY_FEE, PARTICIPATION_MEMBER, IS_APPLY ) values ( SEQ_LEAGUE.nextval, #{leagueName}, current_date, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{prizeMoney}, #{participationTeam}, #{prizeGood}, #{winningTeam}, #{leagueStatusCd}, #{tournamentId}, #{entryFee}, #{participationMember}, #{isApply} )
